Note

The Apache Tomcat project doesn't endorse any of the products mentioned here. They are mentioned just because they are Tomcat centric and may be useful references. The books are listed by descending publication date.


Books

Tomcat committers' names are indicated in bold.

  • How Tomcat Works, by Budi Kurniawan
    ? (09/2003)
  • Apache Tomcat Bible, by Jon Eaves, Warner Godfrey, Rupert Jones
    Hungry Minds, Inc (06/2003)
  • Apache Tomcat Performance Handbook, by Peter Lin, Remy Maucherat
    ? (05/2003)
  • Tomcat: The Definitive Guide, by Jason Brittain, Ian F. Darwin
    O'Reilly & Associates (03/2003)
  • Apache Tomcat Security Handbook, by Vivek Chopra, Ben Galbriaths, Gotham Pollysetty, Brian Rickabaugh, John Turner
    Wrox Press (02/2003)
  • Tomcat Kick Start, by Martin Bond, Debbie Law
    Sams (11/2002)
  • Mastering Tomcat Development, by Peter Harrison, Ian McFarland
    John Wiley & Sons (10/2002)
  • Professional Apache Tomcat, by Chanoch Wiggers, Ben Galbraith, Vivek Chopra, Sing Li, Debashish Bhattacharjee, Amit Bakore, Romin Irani, Sandip Bhattacharya, Chad Fowler
    Wrox Press (09/2002)
  • Tomcat Book Project
  • Apache Jakarta-Tomcat, by James Goodwill
    APress (12/2001)


Articles
  • Apache 1.3.23 + Tomcat 4.0.2 + Load Balancing, by Pascal Forget
  • Clustering Technologies - In Memory Session Replication in Tomcat 4, by Filip Hanik
